content: 1 single_crochet into each st around older kids-40 women-45 sts for older kids size only skip to round 16 after completing this round round 14 1 single_crochet into each of the next 21 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 20 sts women-47 sts round 15 1 single_crochet into each st around women-47 sts round 16 1 single_crochet into each of the next 12 14 17 sts skip the next 10 12 14 sts for thumb 1 single_crochet into each of the next 11 14 16 sts 23 28 33 sts around hand not including thumb round 17 1 single_crochet into each st around 23 28 33 sts repeat round 17 until the measurement from the thumbhole up is 2 2 ¾ 3 ½ approximately 9 12 15 more rounds 3 for preschool size only next round 1 single_crochet into each of the next 6 sts sctog 2 times 1 single_crochet into each of the next 5 sts decrease 20 sts next round 1 single_crochet into each of the next 3 sts decrease 4 times 16 sts next round 1 single_crochet into each st around 16 sts next round decrease 8 times 8 sts fasten_off with a 10 tail using yarn needle thread yarn tail through the front loop of the remaining 8 sts and pull tight weave in ends for older kid size only next round 1 single_crochet into each of the next 5 sts decrease 4 times 24 sts next round 1 single_crochet into each st around 24 sts next round decrease 12 times 12 sts next round 1 single_crochet into each st around 12 sts next round 1 single_crochet into the next st decrease 4 times 8 sts fasten_off with a 10 tail using yarn needle thread yarn tail through the front loop of the remaining 8 sts and pull tight weave in ends for women s size only next round 1 single_crochet into each of the next 9 sts decrease 3 times 30 sts next round 1 single_crochet in each st around 30 sts next round 1 single_crochet into each of the next 3 sts decrease 6 times 24 sts next round 1 single_crochet into each st around 24 sts next round decrease 12 times 12 sts next round 1 single_crochet into each st 12 sts next round 1 single_crochet into the next st decrease 4 times 8 sts fasten_off with a 10 tail using yarn needle thread yarn tail through the front loop of the remaining 8 sts and pull tight weave in ends thumb join yarn to any thumb stitch and make 10 12 14 single_crochet stitches around 1 single_crochet into each st around until thumb measures 1 ½ 2 2 1/2 from crotch about 5 7 9 more row next row decrease 5 6 7 times 5 6 7 sts left fasten_off with a 10 tail using yarn needle thread yarn
